title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 106.3 - Florida test
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 106.3 - Florida test

State Regulations
(a) One
or more representative samples from each seed source shall be submitted from
each field for planting in the Florida test plot. The number of tubers required
to be submitted per sample shall be determined by the certifying agency. Tubers
selected for the Florida test shall not be smaller than 1 1/2 inches nor larger
than 2 1/4 inches. (b) Florida test
results shall not show a total in excess of one half of one percent of virus
(mosaics, leaf roll, other virus) and spindle tuber. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
106.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
